headline.main: Our Ability to Think Upheld; Isolationist Claims of Propaganda-Bred Fear Are Discounted

lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: In an article in THE NEW YORK TIMES of Sept. 30 a United States Senator of isolationist bent is reported as saying that "America has been made to fear by propaganda."
abstract: lr scoring isolationist charges on pro-war fear propaganda
snippet: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: In an article in THE NEW YORK TIMES of Sept. 30 a United States Senator of isolationist bent is reported as saying that "America has been made to fear by propaganda."...
